website_summaries.verdict: If you're short on space, consider this swing arm lamp that will clamp onto most surface edges.
pros: This combo lamp features both a 19-watt compact fluorescent lamp bulb and a 25-watt circline fluorescent tube which can be used together or independently of one another to get your desired brightness
cons: Fewer choices over where you can place it compared to a freestanding model

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The L445BK arrived yesterday in perfect condition and intact bulbs. Packing was very good which prevented shipment damage. I have another lamp that cost almost exactly double and I can not tell much difference between them. I did however install a daylight LED bulb vs the swirly CFL and it works exactly as I needed. No assembly required other than putting the clamp mount where I wanted and sliding the lamp post into it. I have not tried the built in 110 receptacle and do not plan to use that feature, but could be very handy for anyone needing a plug at desktop level. Very happy with this purchase...if things change over time I will amend the review.
customer_reviews.author: james h.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this light to anyone who needs a lower wattage and also the 100 watt at the same work area!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp! With both of it's lights it is so handy! As I cut out the windows and doors of My model cars the low light doesn't cause a glare off the shinny model so I can actually see what I am working on! Since I work with a triple magnifying head set it's 100 watt bulb is also excellent to A perfect combination no matter what You working on! I will be buying another one soon for another work station this would be perfect for! Oh and as I also use it extended to it's maximum reach it holds itself up!
customer_reviews.author: Steven R Glass Sr

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The light has nice long arm and so can shine light on almost an part of my desk (a big one). There are two lights and the combination of both produces a very bright light. I usually use both lights at the same time since I am developing cataracts and they make the world a bit darker for me than people with normal vision would experience. This one is much better than those $20 ones I typically find in the big box stores. I would happily buy another if I needed one.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Point it at the ceiling!
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced the LEDU I bought back in the seventies and used every day and night. The new one is pretty much the same aside from the buttons being a bit different, the extra outlet in the base, and the handle on the rim of the lamp. I love this lamp. The big win is to turn on both bulbs and point the lamp at the ceiling to bounce back wonderful, diffuse, natural light without harsh shadows.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Trainor

customer_reviews.title: Not as stated; not for improvement of low-vision.
customer_reviews.text: The description states that the lamp includes a fluorescent circle light and an incandescent bulb, but it came with both bulbs being fluorescent. The combination lamp was recommended by a low-vision specialist to improve my vision for reading and fine work. Two fluorescent bulbs or a fluorescent and LED combination to not provide the lighting range to improve visual acuity. If purchasing this lamp for low vision, know that you will have to provide your own incandescent bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp. Bulb replacement is a challenge.
customer_reviews.text: I like the lamp itself. The 6500k bulb it comes with, I find was too cool to work with. Finding a replacement (4100K) was very difficult because not many places sell the large diameter bulb it uses. It is not the typical one we are use to. Even after finding one, It is not as wide as the lamp's opening, so I had to use thin wires to hold the bulb in place. Other then that, I do like the quality of the lamp's construction.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, large, versatile, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love the extra outlet at the base, the large size and double light versatility allows me to get great light coverage, intense or soft, depending on the project. The included screw-in bulb is a warmer light so you can get natural light with the ring and/or warm light with the bulb, or just swap in a natural light led bulb as I did. Great arm length and the build feels impressively strong. Am likely to order another one to replace two smaller lamps on my crafts table.
customer_reviews.author: Eff J

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy versatile work-desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy suspension and mounting bracket, two bulbs for optional levels of illumination, adjustable friction at joints to afford flexible placement that is sustained. One of the bulbs was broken in shipping, and protocol is for me to return the entire lamp for replacement. I would recommend Amazon provide another option for such minor shipping consequences. I replaced the bulb locally, but thought I would mention this minor snafu. Nice work-desk lamp. I owned an identical lamp for an estimated ten plus years, and the switches eventually failed, so very pleased to find this replacement.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful light
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good task light for knitting--this one is very adjustable, with a broad light beam which avoids the glare of narrowly focused lights. I wish it came with a desktop mounting--ive got the clamp kind of jury rigged on the edge of a table. It works but isnt very moveable.
customer_reviews.author: bunnyrosenancy

customer_reviews.title: Packaging didn't hold up to the trip, bulb doesn't work, most seems stable
customer_reviews.text: Second of this type ordered, I remember the first getting beat up along the way, but it worked fine once set up. This one's cfl bulb is dead on arrival. All else seems fine, but no favors were done in shipping, box is a bit dinged up. So set up and check as soon as you can on arrival, esp if you're trying to put to together a space in a hurry and need all to work from the get-go.
customer_reviews.author: Derek J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Solid product so far...
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I needed. A 2-bulb lamp on a swing arm. Sturdy, pliable, great light thrown by the 2 lamps. The nuts need tightening already, causing it to droop a bit when extended. Will have to watch this with time, as that's annoying in the extreme. My old one finally lost its ability to be tightened, hence this new one. I need odd angles & security it'll stay where placed. So far, so good, but we'll see... Otherwise, a solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: Candela Records

customer_reviews.title: Best option at the price.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to find sturdy and well build task lamps that are over $200, or garbage for under $30. This exceedingly well built, and the price I paid ($65) a terrific value. I just bought my second one and am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gordon Savage

customer_reviews.title: Built Tough and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Writing review a couple of years after purchase. Doing some revamping of my desk setup and knocked this lamp off the desk and onto the floor twice--No broken spring mounts, hinges or anything. I love this light. Have an LED Daylight bulb in it, just slightly warmer than the fluorescent tube. No heat to speed destruction of the switches. It'll last until the switch quits. Functionality, toughness, longevity, price, you can't ask for more. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gasman

customer_reviews.title: Both switches broke in less than two years of infrequent use
customer_reviews.text: This lamp arrived dented, but it didn't seem worth the trouble to repackage it and send it back, knowing that it would just end up in a landfill, so I lived with the dent. I've now had the lamp for less than two years--and both of the light switches are completely broken. I used this lamp rarely, so it's the cheap plastic switches that are to blame, not overuse. The only way for me to use this lamp now is to plug and unplug it from the wall. If it doesn't go on, a smack near the switches will sometimes make it come to life. Seriously disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hersey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I have a similar lamp which is more than 40 years old. This is equally well-made, if not an improvement. I love the separate clamp into which the lamp inserts, and I love the outlet. So handy.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoors in WNC

customer_reviews.title: It’s big, does the job
customer_reviews.text: I was not aware it was really big, sometimes one will view the photo on the screen as being blown up but I have good use for it, two different light sources too. Rating 10 thanks Greg H.
customer_reviews.author: gregory  hawke

customer_reviews.title: good lamp. But it doesn't rotate very smoothly
customer_reviews.text: Overall, good lamp. But it doesn't rotate very smoothly. You have to grip the lamp "shade" pretty carefully to turn it. Also, the switches are on the top of the lamp, which is a little odd. Most lamps like this that I have had in the past had the switches on the base (or at least the switch for the incandescent bulb was on the base). The extra A/C socket in the base is handy but, as others have mentioned, it moves along with the base so that may not work out for plugging things into it.
customer_reviews.author: NY Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light, but attaching to the desk poses a problem - it's HEAVY!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these lights to use on desks with metal frames and glass tops. The light is AWESOME! Perfect for virtually every circumstance. However - it's HEAVY! We spent more time looking for a good mounting bracket than it took to find the light. We ended up buying a metal clamp that was suggested and had great reviews. The clamp lasted a little over 6 months, so replacing and buying a spare. Love the lamp, but would love to find a more long lasting clamp to keep the light in use.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Collins

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light!
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are amazing. So bright, sturdy construction, and big! We use them for sculpting and painting, since the lighting is very important. I would’ve given 5 stars but I bought 2 of these, one came with a burned out cfl bulb and the other came with a broken cfl bulb. Otherwise these are great lamps!
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: The lamp appears to be of a decent quality. ...
customer_reviews.text: The lamp appears to be of a decent quality. The dual lamps function properly, and the lamp does stay positioned correctly on a slanted drafting board without sagging, or springing out of position. The unit comes with the necessary mounting clamp, so there is no need to purchase the additional clamp that Amazon indicates is often purchased with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Cedric Shoebridge

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these lamps for my drafting table. One is perfect, the other has loose joints that cannot be tightened and it collapses easily. And 5 months after receiving it, the switch for the incandescent bulb no longer works. Now only the ring light works and that is not what I purchased this expensive light for. Of course, the warrantee is up, and there is no recourse. I am disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia I. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Junk! Arrived Broken. Lamp Clips Are Plastic Junk. Center Bulb was Broken. Worth about $10
customer_reviews.text: This is not the product shown in the photos. It is junk. The circline bulb is held in by plastic clips. All three clips were broken. The center bulb can use an incandescent or compact fluorescent bulb. They provided a compact fluorescent. The compact fluorescent was broken in its box. The shipping box is paper-thin. They charged me almost $100 for this product. It could not have cost more the $1.25 to make AND ship from China. I have an original Ledu Tai-Lite from many years ago. It is a great product. This one is junk. Junk. Junk. Junk. I bought a replacement identical lamp from Staples. It too is: JUNK. JUNK. JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: RSC - Nyack, NY

customer_reviews.title: Best option for a cheap price
customer_reviews.text: My previous duo drafting lamp lasted 10 years. Best product for my work space both for computer task or physical tasks like drafting or model making. Don't know how long this will last but seems sturdy so far. As an architect this is the cheapest option for the best results in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jiarui S.

customer_reviews.title: Will it last?
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the lamp. It Does what it says and I like the light quality. However, an important component is made of plastic. The lamp rests upon a post. If it breaks from wear and tear I will give it a one star.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kahn

customer_reviews.title: Not 100W incandescent as stated - 19W CFL -but even so a nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: Description says "It accepts a 100W incandescent bulb and a 22W Circline fluorescent tube, both included." ... I particularly wanted to use an incandescent so was disappointed when it turned up with a 19W CFL Edison screw bulb. Plus the sticker in the map says "19W CFL max" for the center bulb (the ring is a 25W florescent) -- you cannot even use your own 100W, or even 60W incandescent. However -- it's a nice solid lamp with nice even light and great feel
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell's Demon

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Bought used, like new. Bottom piece that is supposed to clamp onto desk is missing. Decided to keep cause we can't wait for replacement. Had to buy additional clamp to replace missing part.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding light!
customer_reviews.text: Light output is great, joints are smooth and holds position nicely. Base is a little big which is the only negative I can think of. The base houses an electrical socket which is a nice touch but you absolutely positively can't place this at the back of a desk without a significant amount of clearance needed. I'd estimate that the desk would have to be at least 3 inches away from the wall for it to rotate freely keeping in mind that the lamp arm still wouldn't be able to extend backwards. Overall a great lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Robert B

customer_reviews.title: Piece of $***. Don't  waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Had this about a month before the flimsy plastic clips that hold the fluorescent bulb in snapped. The back plate of the metal foot that attaches to the desk also got loose and pulled away after just a few months. After that I used only the incandescent bulb and didn't dare to plug anything into the attached outlet becsuse of the plate that was coming loose. After about a year the bolt attaching the metal lampshade to the arm fell off. I threw it away. Piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This lamp is perfect. When I first saw the price I thought it was a little expensive but I ordered it anyway and I couldn’t be happier. It is sturdy and very high-quality. It is very easy to adjust, it moves effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a compact setup
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Ample brightness and continent. The lamp is a little heavy for the structure but it holds up well. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bennet Manuel

customer_reviews.title: JUNK, ballast barely lasted 3 years on 2 of these lamps!
customer_reviews.text: Why is EVERYTHING made so crappy these days??? It's ridiculous! Less than 3 years and the ballast self-fries itself. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Matt F

customer_reviews.title: A lot of light!
customer_reviews.text: Great for paintings and love the two light sources. A little big but works great!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Ledu Clamp-on Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful lamp. The only reason I haven't given it five stars is because I want to see how it holds up after time and usage. It's super easy to put together. The picture doesn't do it justice. The circumference of the lamp head is about that of a basketball which enables it to light a much larger area. I will definitely purchase another. This is easily one of the best desk lamps I've ever had. Also, with the clamp, you don't have to worry about it falling off the desk, and it saves desk space.
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: SWITCHES DON'T LAST....TRY ANOTHER BRAND
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months the switches quit working. They appear to be cheap plastic junk. I have had these lamps for years and the old push button switches lasted for years not months. Newer lamps are crap and the replacement for the circle bulbs are impossible to find.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL DAN

customer_reviews.title: Giant Studio Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I have a 25-year-old version of this lamp that I love, but this one is more streamlined, has an additional knob that helps stabilize it when it's clamped, has an easier on-off switch, and it seems brighter! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MNP

customer_reviews.title: Great Light
customer_reviews.text: It's the 3rd one I've bought and still using all of them..
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Got two of them, they look great, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I like the product overall, but the company needs to work on tightening the joints near the transformer and the arm of the lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: I received the wrong lamp plus it was damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Its not the product pictured. I would not recommend ordering
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this some time ago and just found the review page. It's very sturdy love the two light system. Has a long reach.
customer_reviews.author: Stumble in the dark

customer_reviews.title: Defective and haven't received refund three weeks out!
customer_reviews.text: The lamp was defective - the spring that keeps it's position was faulty and the lamp wouldn't stay upright. Have returned it and three weeks later STILL haven't received my refund. I will be buying the real version: Luxo Combination Task Light. It's more expensive but less hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Elise M. Primavera

customer_reviews.title: Switch does not work well
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lamp for several years. I am completely satisfied with every feature except for the toggle switch for both of the lamps. If you toggle the switch in the normal manner, it does not work. You have to press very firmly and sort of rock it back and forth. For some reason it does not engage at a normal pressure. Hopefully this was a glitch that has since be resolved. I realize now I should have returned the lamp when I first got it.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Annes Lace

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: This is an improvement over the cheapo I was using before, but this lamp, like the previous one, still wants to drift a bit away from where I try to make it stay when I move it around to get good light on my work. I like the dual-light option, but it still has nothing like the smooth, firm and steady feel of the 40-year-old one I had to discard some years ago when it finally died. I thought paying a lot more than the cheapo would get me there, but not really.....
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Frishman

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime product
customer_reviews.text: This is the lamp I used for over thirty years as a Dental Technician. The new one looks like it will serve me as well. Just as well made.. I am going to change the incandescent bulb to a daylight LED though.
customer_reviews.author: Noter

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!! This light works properly.
customer_reviews.text: The switches on the Alvins always go bad. But not these. So far, they're great! (and less expensive).
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Epoc

customer_reviews.title: Great light. Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Very good light. Looks great and it is very unique. I love it on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: A
customer_reviews.text: I have had one almost identical for the last 20 years. The switch stopped working on my old one. Was so glad I could find it again.
customer_reviews.author: a photographer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I received this lamp on february 10, 2017. Today is March 27, 2017 and it has stopped working. All other electric devices on the same outlet work. The deadline for returning lamp was march 12, 2017. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Philipp

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than I expected. I LOVE this lamp. It has the cool light circular fluoroescent bulb and I put in a warm incandescent, so I can use either or both.
customer_reviews.author: Parront

customer_reviews.title: Good solution to our problem but not the greatest quality ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this light because of the length of extension. It came poorly packaged and one of the on off switches doesn't work so we leave them on and plug in and unplug as we need the light. It does provide ample light for our son to use on his school work which is why we got it in the first place. Good solution to our problem but not the greatest quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Cristine Allen

customer_reviews.title: same bolt at the base of the lamp always breaks
customer_reviews.text: have had like 8 of these. the light quality is terrific but the construction quality is poor, I’ve had to replace them after about a year sometimes less,
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: NO Replacement Bulb !
customer_reviews.text: Don't know where the statement about a 7.5 inch bulb came from. My bulb is 9 inches outside diameter. There is no replacement. Amazon nor LUXO should be selling this fixture !
customer_reviews.author: Robert Epps

customer_reviews.title: See your work like you never have before
customer_reviews.text: Update: I loved my lamp but after one year the circular light died. I have not been able to find a replacement anywhere. Making this an expensive ordinary table lamp now. Original review: A must have for any artist's workbench. The two different types of lightbulb allow you to see colors clearly. The adjustable arm makes it easy to place the light right where you need it the most. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa E.

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction. Good lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality lamp. Solid Construction. Bought the extra bracket ( Metal Adjustable Arm Clamp From Studio Designs ) just to make sure it fit our table.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie PA

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp but...
customer_reviews.text: Solid enough and plenty long enough for what I wanted. The big complaint is that it uses a 25 watt T5 fluorescent bulb which arrived broken and is seemingly impossible to replace. Bulbs are not guaranteed... If Amazon is going to sell this lamp they should at least provide a source for replacement bulbs. I wouldnt recommend buying it unless you had a sure source for replacement bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: granzombi

customer_reviews.title: nice bright lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Ledu lamp because my previous swing arm lamp (brand unknown) had a busted switch. I use this lamp at my work desk for reading because with my eyesight I need good light. The combination flourescent and incadescent gives good light that can be directed where I want it. The push button switches are easy to use. The swing arm and clamps are not real heavy duty but I don't move it very much. Have had it for a month and no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Former art director a similar product that I had as an art director but $100 less.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Podorson

customer_reviews.title: I like this light
customer_reviews.text: I like this light, I replaced a similar and really expensive draughtsman lamp. This is totally adequate. The two types of light are good for any type of close work.
customer_reviews.author: amfli

customer_reviews.title: Replacement bulb availability
customer_reviews.text: FC25T5/865 25W T5 6500K Daylight Circline Fluorescent Lamp available @ ReplacementLightBulbs.com
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi K.

customer_reviews.title: This incandescent plus fluorescent light boosted my spirits when the ...
customer_reviews.text: This incandescent plus fluorescent light boosted my spirits when the dark days set in. The natural light not only dispels seasonable affective disorder, it keeps me workrng until late at night.
customer_reviews.author: lynn sherrell

customer_reviews.title: Best desk lamp on the market.
customer_reviews.text: One of three in my office. The oldest is probable 15 years old. Best desk lamp on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby E Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as stated by Seller
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lamp. It moves in any direction you need it to and holds in place even when stretched out to the full 48 inches! As a private Bookkeeper it's vital to have good lighting and this lamp is perfect! I would recommend this lamp to all my friends and associates.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Mickey

customer_reviews.title: mercury bulbs (the incandescent bulb contains mercury) burned out pretty fast, but you can put a regular bulb ...
customer_reviews.text: mercury bulbs (the incandescent bulb contains mercury) burned out pretty fast, but you can put a regular bulb in and it will work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: blotter & quill

customer_reviews.title: I like this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I put this lamp over my sewing machine. I like having the two types of light. It helps with matching colors. And I can adjust it into the right position.
customer_reviews.author: WJK

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: There are too many cheap swing-arm lamps that are not very good. This is the real deal. It is well built and sturdy. The 2 lamps are nice to have but not essential. I end up using the ring lamp most of the time--it's brighter.
customer_reviews.author: shep

customer_reviews.title: Circular Lightbulb does not turn on...
customer_reviews.text: Would like to ask for a replacement bulb - the one that shipped with the lamp does not work... Not sure how to contact seller.
customer_reviews.author: MSP

customer_reviews.title: More of a reliable thing.
customer_reviews.text: Use for Design & Illustration work. The first similar product served me well for many years. Look forward to enjoying this for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp a few weeks back,it works well,love the light it provides,well put together. The outlet on the base is very convenient. A minor flaw is the two plastic knobs that tighten the lamp pivot point and the elbow I am afraid that the the threads may wear out too soon.
customer_reviews.author: L. Arias

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, natural light with both bulbs on. Great deal for a lamp that could cost a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: david a

customer_reviews.title: Bright wide angle white lighting.
customer_reviews.text: We like the bright white light and the wide spread. We use them as added lighting on our work tables where we cut and sew garments.
customer_reviews.author: SamuelRD1

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Puts off good light, nice and sturdy, stays in place once positioned. I was pleased that the one I received has more of a satin finish. The photo looks more like a gloss finish.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie O

customer_reviews.title: crappy quality control
customer_reviews.text: I opened up the the box and low and behold one of the the plastic pieces that holds in the circle lamp was broken. what crappy quality control from Ledu. The lamp sticks out from the shade housing, how much trouble do you think its going to be to return the thing especially since I've got too much work to do and really need this lamp. Shame on Ledu for this, I guess pride of workmanship doesn't mean anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: All the kids in the dorm now want one just like it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought versions of this in the past for my desk and my wife's desk. Bought this one for my daughter's dorm room. All the kids in the dorm now want one just like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Loyalist

customer_reviews.title: Nice but huge and came with broken bulb
customer_reviews.text: Came with 1 broken light bulb and is way bigger than I expected, but is nice qaulity and has an outlet built in
customer_reviews.author: reice

customer_reviews.title: ... Ledu lamp that had a floor base that I loved. Although not stated in description
customer_reviews.text: I had an old Ledu lamp that had a floor base that I loved. Although not stated in description, this lamp fit perfectly in my old base and now functions exactly like my old lamp did. Highly pleased with the result.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID LEE

customer_reviews.title: Clamps holding the florescent bulb break
customer_reviews.text: After only 18 months, the clamps holding the circular bulb break, rendering it useless. I had expected better quality for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Milton E. Blitch

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was a joke—flimsy and without any regard to protecting the lamp or bulb. There was no desk fixture, no incandescent bulb, and the fluorescent bulb was not working. Dreadful. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, joints are snug so the lamp stays in place. Sturdy table clamp
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Lamp is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Comes with both light bulbs. Screw on the bracket, insert the lamp and done. Its big, comes over the top of my computer monitor, one light on for good light, both on for bright. Fluorescent bulbs, so no heat. Easy to adjust. Great quality. Better than expected and far better than any I looked at in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Old guy who likes cars and cycles

customer_reviews.title: Great service, too
customer_reviews.text: Now, that's the way a desk lamp SHOULD be! Great service, too!
customer_reviews.author: Fydler

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the $20 lamp I purchased at a big box store which broke immediately upon clamping to my drafting board, this one seems well made and durable. It provides ample light for task work and should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Norm De Plume

customer_reviews.title: I am happy I purchased it
customer_reviews.text: I love it, ithastwodifferent light setting that allow you to truly anylize your piece true color. It is very easy to attach to any serface with out damaging it. It has a built in out lit and is easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: KTorres911

customer_reviews.title: good, sturdy lamp
customer_reviews.text: good ,sturdy lamp. The quality I hoped for. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT

customer_reviews.title: Ledu Drafting Lamp
customer_reviews.text: A genuine Ledu manufactured lamp, not a cheep knock off, I am very pleased, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: OliveOil

customer_reviews.title: the handle bar is even coated with rubber so that grab feel is very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Uber-class construction and design. you can tell the materials used to construct the frames are heavy gauge steel and attention to detail is impeccable. the handle bar is even coated with rubber so that grab feel is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Great Light !!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has this light on her work table to use for sewing. It provides light everywhere on her 6 ft. wide work table.
customer_reviews.author: R. Spella

customer_reviews.title: .Very helpful lighting... many years ago --this makes the second I have loved and was glad to find it via Google in ...
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these purchased many years ago--this makes the second I have loved and was glad to find it via Google in your Amazon listing. My vision including glaucoma and severe dry eyes requires extra lighting and I will get another shortly as its extends my comfort in reading time daily.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley M. Lingebach

customer_reviews.title: I thought Ledu was a GOOD name...
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived, the circular fluorescent lamp didn't work. It also drooped, even with the knobs tightened as far as I could. I thought Ledu made a better product than this - it droops more than the cheap $20 swing arm lamps, and costs a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: B. Black

customer_reviews.title: desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is great. My son bought one prior to my purchase and I liked it so I bought one also. The only problem/concern with my purchase is the packaging in which it was shipped. Was poorly packaged but fortunately no damage. Thanks very much for this nice light.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! and for the price the best option out there! Stable and works flawlessly on a daily basis! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I needed a desk lamp to use with my computer since the one I was using was 15 years old and sometimes went out before I turned it off. The Ledu L445Bk clamp on lamp more than adequately satisfied my needs. It has two light sources -- a ring lamp and a 100 watt energy-saving bulb, either of which provides adequate lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Luis L. Granados

customer_reviews.title: ledu L445BK swing arm clamp on lamp.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp has a decent mounting balance to remain stationary on my. Drafting table that I use as a model ship building surface. Illumination is OK but could be a bit more directional for my usage.
customer_reviews.author: ARMAND ST. PIERRE

customer_reviews.title: Hesitated...but 100% happy
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure whether to purchase this lamp...I don't know I felt it could be shady or bad quality...I was so wrong...it is definitely worth the price...I can't imagine ever going back to not having one of these lamps. It attaches perfectly onto my desk...is so flexible and swings and swivels every way. AMAZING LAMP! Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good fixture though
customer_reviews.text: This was just what we were looking for. The only problem we had was the lamp for the fixture was not packed properly and had shattered in shipping. Good fixture though.
customer_reviews.author: Sharla Victor

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these to replace 2 older models. They work great and look good also. The switches are improved over older models.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Lindenberg

customer_reviews.title: BAD ON /OFF SWITCH
customer_reviews.text: The on off rocker switch stop working the first day, this lamp (ledu L445WT) should have a more reliable on/off switch. Very disappointed with this item.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: meet the description, good quality product, international shipping, good packaging, arrived in time. I would love it if it would come with an alternative for 220v ballast, but that's my personal difficulties, nothing to do with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Panagiotis Manoleas

customer_reviews.title: what i expected
customer_reviews.text: though its kind of expensive. i did want to get a cheap light for my kids for doing homework. i am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: kidslight

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Light.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light, but one light bulb arrived broken. They did replace the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M.

customer_reviews.title: not use to this from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Came without an attaching base. Very disappointed. Not used to this from Amazon. I always use Amazon for the no hassle reason, now I have to go through the process to resolve this. Also, I don't like that you have no contact personnel. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: john gaetano

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived fully intact and in great packaging. Simple to set up and to use, the electrical outlet on the base is a great addition too. Everything I wanted the lamp to be.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

product_meta.title: Ledu L445WT Professional fluorescent/incandescent swing arm clamp-on lamp, 40 reach, white
product_meta.description:
Color:White / CreamVersatile combo lamp includes both a 19 watt CFL bulb and a 25 watt circline fluorescent tube on a 37-1/2 in. spring-balanced arm. Switch allows use of a circline fluorescent only, CFL only or both at the same time. Convenience outlet in clamp-on base. ETL listed. 44-1/2 in. H.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Ledu Professional Three-Way Lamp allows users to choose between incandescent and/or fluorescent lighting. This swing-arm, clamp-on lamp has a reach of 40 inches and a convenient positioning handle on the shade. It accepts a 100W incandescent bulb and a 22W Circline fluorescent tube, both included.

 What's in the Box
LEDU Professional Three-Way Lamp, 100W incandescent bulb, and 22W Circline fluorescent bulb.
feature_bullets: Professional Combination Clamp-On Lamp. UL Listed. Manufacturer's three-year mechanical, one-year electrical warranty.
Manufacturer's three-year mechanical, one-year electrical warranty.
Three-way switch for incandescent, fluorescent or.
